name: Words Scramble - Activities
description:
Words Scramble- Activities
You will be amazed to know the number of activities that a human being carries out through a life time! Some activities like sleeping and eating are taken for granted by us and some not so common ones like proposing are celebrated! Play this app full of images related to activities and words that are a part of those images.
Features:
•Beautiful pictures of different activities.
•Unscramble words related to different activities in the pictures.
•Option of skipping puzzle.
•Option of revealing or deleting letters.
•Choose soundtrack from 5 soothing musical scores.
•Track high scores across friends, opponents, and the world with enabled leaderboards.
•Share images of solved puzzles with friends on Facebook

As these apps are free, they may contain third party advertisements
